text: yeah, i was. i was 200 pounds by the time i was in middle school. kids were mean. cows may be sacred there, but it doesn't help if you look like one. anyway, i was pretty lonely, so i had to make up my own stories and games, and i promised myself if i ever made any friends that, that i would play those games with them.
